definition: to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't
mark/sign/talisman/to seal/to correspond to/tally/symbol/written charm/to coincide

sentences.english: If suddenly loses you, just like the rests inserts my heart.
sentences.chinese: 若突然失去你，犹如休止符插入了我的心。

sentences.english: When the song came to a rest, she paused for a while.
sentences.chinese: 唱到了休止符的时候，她停顿了一下。

sentences.english: Put an end to his guilt and suffering.
sentences.chinese: 把他的罪恶和痛苦划上休止符吧。

sentences.english: The easiest part of life is over now.
sentences.chinese: 最简单的生活现在画上了休止符。

sentences.english: They are momentary pauses on the path to success!
sentences.chinese: 他们只是你通往成功路上的暂时的休止符。

sentences.english: The plain lives will gradually decreased like rests in a movement.
sentences.chinese: 简单的生命会逐渐单调成乐章里的休止符。

sentences.english: How does the musician read the "rest"?
sentences.chinese: 可是让我们看，音乐家如何对付这些休止符呢？

sentences.english: There is no music in a rest, but there is the making of music in it.
sentences.chinese: 在音乐谱中有一种符号，叫做休止符。

sentences.english: The road is too difficult to walk over and draw a beautiful stop.
sentences.chinese: 那条路太难走结束，画个漂亮的休止符。

sentences.english: When the last note rings, miss was forced to draw on pause.
sentences.chinese: 当最后一个音符响起，想念被逼画上休止符。

definition: (music) note/phonetic component of a Chinese character/phonetic symbol/phonogram
with a grunting sound it stops (idiom); to come to an end spontaneously (esp. of sound)
